meanings.definition: Constituting number ninety in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: The ninetieth day of school was a celebration.
meanings.sent2: She sat in the ninetieth row of the auditorium.
meanings.sent3: The ninetieth cookie was the sweetest of them all.
meanings.sent4: Reaching the ninetieth mile of the marathon felt like a great achievement.
meanings.sent5: The ninetieth star in the sky shone the brightest.

meanings.sent1: He ate the ninetieth cookie from the jar.
meanings.sent2: The ninetieth of the puzzle pieces was missing.
meanings.sent3: Finding the ninetieth egg in the carton was a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The ninetieth seat in the row was the most comfortable.
meanings.sent5: She won the prize for finding the ninetieth hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to ninety.
meanings.sent1: Her birthday fell on the ninetieth day of the year.
meanings.sent2: He was born on the ninetieth of December.
meanings.sent3: The ninetieth in line won a special prize.
meanings.sent4: The ninetieth in the queue got the last ticket.
meanings.sent5: She reached the ninetieth level of the game after hours of playing.
